channel.title: Everytime i add drops to my npcdrop i get this:
channel.description:
Hello,
I am making drops for Chaos Elements, But it is a little bit.
I added it, compiled no problems but when i run this appears: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2038) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:114)[/code]
And when i delete it then there is no problem,
Is there a way to fix this?
Thanks, [USING *DELTA*]

item.title: Everytime i add drops to my npcdrop i get this:
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Try trimming it down a bit? By the way, did you Google ‘ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException’? I don’t feel like it, and I would like to know if it refers to the length of the array, or a value within the array.

EDIT: Actually, I was just messing around with arrays. I forgot that arrays started with int[0] so I tried to call int[2] and there were only 2 variables in my array. That threw the same error. Get my point?

Read full topic
